there?"},{"lineNumber":177288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance..."},{"lineNumber":177289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ様、ドウシマシタ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Satella, what’s wrong?"},{"lineNumber":177290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……別に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hm... nothing really..."},{"lineNumber":177291,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ふふん、あいつも最終決戦を前にして","translatedEnglishLine":"(Heh heh, he might be getting nervous before the final battle)"},{"lineNumber":177292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　固くなっているかも知れないな）","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe he’s getting stiff."},{"lineNumber":177293,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ここは一つ、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Now is the time,"},{"lineNumber":177294,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主であるサテラから激励でもくれてやるか）","translatedEnglishLine":"for Satella, his master, to give him some encouragement.)"},{"lineNumber":177295,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あいつ、あまりのありがたさに、","translatedEnglishLine":"(He might even start crying from how touched he is.)"},{"lineNumber":177296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　泣き出してしまうかも知れないな）","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":177297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　サテラ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? Satella?"},{"lineNumber":177298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだ、そんな遠くからジーッと見て","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you staring at me from so far away?"},{"lineNumber":177299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"...!"},{"lineNumber":177300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「べっ、別にジーッと見てなんか――」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm not staring at you or anything—"},{"lineNumber":177301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いや、そう、サテラはお前に話があるんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, no, well, Satella has something to talk to you about."},{"lineNumber":177302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主からのありがたい話だ、背筋を正して聞けよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a valuable message from your master, so straighten your back and listen."},{"lineNumber":177303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話？　なんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"A talk? What is it?"},{"lineNumber":177304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, that is..."},{"lineNumber":177305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あー……えと、それは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, uh... um, that is..."},{"lineNumber":177306,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あ、あれ？","translatedEnglishLine":"(Huh?,"},{"lineNumber":177307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか……急に、言葉が出てこない……）","translatedEnglishLine":"suddenly, I can’t find the words...)"},{"lineNumber":177308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえーい、たのしー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yay, this is fun!"},{"lineNumber":177309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラちゃんもお酒飲む？","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella-chan, do you want to drink some alcohol too?"},{"lineNumber":177310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かろ、持ってこようか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Karo, shall we bring something?"}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was only you.
...Thank you.
That's all there is to it.
Hmph, as long as you don’t get in my way,
I’ll keep using you from now on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃこっちの台詞じゃい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s what I should be saying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂がいなきゃ魔人に歯も立たん癖に」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without me, you wouldn’t stand a chance against the demon.
Well then, I guess it's about time to go.
Hey, Cafe!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、何しに来たんだお前」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seriously, what did you come here for?
With so many of us here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に酒飲んだこともなかったしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we’ve never even had a drink together.
It’s nice once in a while, right?
I don’t need even once in a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで駄剣と酒飲まにゃならんのだ」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why should I drink with a lousy swordsman?
Is that enough already?
Yeah, long talks between men are,
not really our style.
Whether we cry or laugh,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分明日の戦いで全てが決まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everything will probably be decided in tomorrow’s battle.
What should be said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: するべきことも終わったよ」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and what should be done, is all finished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、そんなことはどうでもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, I don’t care about that stuff.
Rather than that, since it’s a special occasion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カフェちゃん俺と向こうでしっぽりお話でも……」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cafe-chan, why don’t you have a private little chat with me over there...
Ehh, what should I do~?
Hey hey hey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人がせっかく渋くキメたんだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just tried to act cool and serious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうノリはやめんかい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stop that kind of mood!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっとも渋くなんかなかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You didn’t seem cool at all.
It doesn’t suit you, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んもー、あんたらは本当にもー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geez, you guys, really!
A final banquet held in the Monster World,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終決戦前の最後の宴会。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the last party before the final battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宴会の参加者は目立たないようにと配慮し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The participants were careful not to stand out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さわさわと静かに騒いでいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gently and quietly making a fuss.
...Hmm, is that over there?
Rance...
Lady Satella, what’s wrong?
Hm... nothing really...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ふふん、あいつも最終決戦を前にして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Heh heh, he might be getting nervous before the final battle)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固くなっているかも知れないな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe he’s getting stiff.
(Now is the time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主であるサテラから激励でもくれてやるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for Satella, his master, to give him some encouragement.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あいつ、あまりのありがたさに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (He might even start crying from how touched he is.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣き出してしまうかも知れないな）

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Satella?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、そんな遠くからジーッと見て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you staring at me from so far away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「べっ、別にジーッと見てなんか――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I'm not staring at you or anything—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、いや、そう、サテラはお前に話があるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, well, Satella has something to talk to you about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主からのありがたい話だ、背筋を正して聞けよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a valuable message from your master, so straighten your back and listen.
A talk? What is it?
Well, that is...
Ah, uh... um, that is...
(Huh?,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか……急に、言葉が出てこない……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: suddenly, I can’t find the words...)
Yay, this is fun!
Satella-chan, do you want to drink some alcohol too?
Karo, shall we bring something?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
